policy_intro_paragraph1: This Privacy Policy explains what personal data is collected when you use the Wordle Clash: Nation Domination mobile app (the "App") and the services provided through it (together with the App, the "Service"), how such personal data will be used, and shared.
policy_intro_paragraph2: BY USING THE SERVICE, YOU PROMISE US THAT (I) YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTAND AND AGREE TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY, AND (II) YOU ARE OVER 16 YEARS OF AGE (OR HAVE HAD YOUR PARENT OR GUARDIAN READ AND AGREE TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY FOR YOU). If you do not agree, or are unable to make this promise, you must not use the Service.
section1_description: The personal data provided to us will be processed by:

section2_info_personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, and any other details you provide to us.
section2_info_usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use the App, including actions, frequency of use, and device information.
section2_info_cookies: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: To enhance user experience and track usage patterns, we may use cookies and similar technologies.
section3_description: We use the collected data for the following purposes:
section3_use_provide: To provide, operate, and maintain the Service
section3_use_improve: To improve, personalize, and expand the Service
section3_use_communicate: To communicate with you, including sending updates and promotional material (if you opt in)
section3_use_monitor: To monitor usage and prevent abuse of the Service
section4_description: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. However, we may share your data in the following cases:
section4_share_providers: With third-party service providers who assist in the operation of the Service
section4_share_legal: If required by law, or if we believe it is necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of Wordle Clash Nation, our users, or others.
section5_right_correction: Request the correction or deletion of your data
